'''Prismarine brick stairs''' are a [[prismarine brick]] variant of [[stairs]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Prismarine brick stairs can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{breaking row
